intro: Zanthoxylum liboense, commonly known as the Yunnan prickly ash, is a deciduous shrub or small tree native to China. It belongs to the Rutaceae family and is characterized by its compound leaves and clusters of small, yellowish-green flowers. The plant produces red, fleshy berries that are an important food source for various wildlife species. Zanthoxylum liboense is often found in moist, shaded areas of mountainous regions. Its ornamental value and medicinal properties make it a notable species in its native habitat.
